item.title: I need some help with some things
item.dc:creator: @booster booster
item.description:
@booster wrote:

                                    [u][b]IM USING PIMPSCAPE SOURCE [/b]  [/u]
  1. i cant get this code to work on my server

[code]// Playercount at top of screen
public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("@cya@Players - @red@" + players, 6570);
sendFrame126("@red@B@gre@o@red@o@gre@s@red@t@gre@e@red@r@gre@s@red@c@gre@a@red@p@gre@e @red@P@gre@k", 6572);
sendFrame126("@yel@O@gre@w@yel@n@gre@e@yel@r @red@= @gre@B@yel@o@gre@o@yel@s@gre@t@yel@e@gre@r@yel@1@gre@2@yel@3", 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673); // 6673}}}

}[/code]

  1. and how do i get the give admin mod and owner to work so can someone give me the codes for the pimpscape source

  2. i want an auto restarter also for my server where do i get one and i want to add the timer to top of the screen so people know when there going to be an reboot [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 05, 2009, 12:32:40 am[/size][hr]bump
